analysis_disability: "Good eyesight, normal colour vision and good hearing." this is vague and does not clarify if accommodations are made for those who wear glasses/hearing aids etc.
text: :  . ,  . Responsibilities: Clarification of the conditions for the future construction of railway lines. natural landscape, relief, soil, flowing and underground waters, the state of existing railways and highways, the intensity of traffic in the present and in the future. Design, construction, expansion, maintenance and reconstruction of railways and related artificial structures, highways, streets, airfields. Dismantling of railway lines and structures. Planning and management of road safety and transport construction, taking into account social, economic, environmental, medical and ethical aspects, labor protection. Analyze survey reports, maps, drawings, blueprints, aerial photography, or other topographical or geologic data. Inspect project sites to monitor progress and ensure conformance to design specifications and safety or sanitation standards. Estimate quantities and cost of materials, equipment, or labor to determine project feasibility. Provide technical advice to industrial or managerial personnel regarding design, construction, program modifications, or structural repairs. Direct or participate in surveying to lay out installations or establish reference points, grades, or elevations to guide construction. Monitor construction activities, ensuring compliance with environmental, safety, or other governmental regulations. Manage and direct the construction, operations, or maintenance activities at project site. Requirements: Good problem-solving skills. The ability to work both as part of a team and alone. Good communication skills. Good eyesight, normal colour vision and good hearing. An understanding of industry quality standards. A willingness to work flexibly. A knowledge of safe working practices. Language skills: Kazakh (fluent), Russian (fluent), English (intermediate). Time managementTeambuildingQuality Control. Cost ManagementReportingInterpersonal skillsPlanningProject Documentation. Statistics  ,   , 34.

{"document_id": "Kaggle::techmap::6145106f3da58f0d52e8c59e::headhunter_kz", "source": "headhunter_kz", "country": "KZ", "company": "Китайская Гражданская Инженерно-Строительная Корпорация в Республике Казахстан", "position": "Railway Engineer", "notes": "", "original": "

Требуемый опыт работы: не требуется

Полная занятость, полный день

Responsibilities:
  • Clarification of the conditions for the future construction of railway lines - natural landscape, relief, soil, flowing and underground waters, the state of existing railways and highways, the intensity of traffic in the present and in the future;
  • Design, construction, expansion, maintenance and reconstruction of railways and related artificial structures, highways, streets, airfields;
  • Dismantling of railway lines and structures;
  • Planning and management of road safety and transport construction, taking into account social, economic, environmental, medical and ethical aspects, labor protection.
  • Analyze survey reports, maps, drawings, blueprints, aerial photography, or other topographical or geologic data.
  • Inspect project sites to monitor progress and ensure conformance to design specifications and safety or sanitation standards.
  • Estimate quantities and cost of materials, equipment, or labor to determine project feasibility.
  • Provide technical advice to industrial or managerial personnel regarding design, construction, program modifications, or structural repairs.
  • Direct or participate in surveying to lay out installations or establish reference points, grades, or elevations to guide construction.
  • Monitor construction activities, ensuring compliance with environmental, safety, or other governmental regulations.
  • Manage and direct the construction, operations, or maintenance activities at project site.
Requirements:​​​​​​​
  • Good problem-solving skills
  • The ability to work both as part of a team and alone
  • Good communication skills
  • Good eyesight, normal colour vision and good hearing
  • An understanding of industry quality standards
  • A willingness to work flexibly
  • A knowledge of safe working practices
  • Language skills: Kazakh (fluent), Russian (fluent), English (intermediate)

Ключевые навыки

Английский язык
Time management
Teambuilding
Quality Control
Cost Management
Reporting
Interpersonal skills
Planning
Project Documentation
Statistics

Адрес

Алматы, улица Абиша Кекильбайулы, 34
Показать на большой карте
"}
